law.catch_line: Public assistance funds -- Availability to secretary.
law.text: All money appropriated by this state, all money received from the United States or any agency thereof, and all money received from any other source for the public assistance functions administered by the cabinet are hereby appropriated and shall be available to the secretary for expenditure consistent with the provisions of this chapter and KRS Chapter 195.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(21) and (29). -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 11. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 4. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 6. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 10.
